page.title: 04Health Care in Bramley_1985
page.content: On Tuesday morning a lady came in to talk to us about Health. Her name was Mrs.Wadsworth, and she is our Health Visitor.{The Wickersley Health Centre was opened four years ago, in 1981. The Health Centre has 4{Doctors}who are called General Practitioners. The Health Centre has a{District {Nurse}who looks at peoples ears and stitches. If you are pregnant a {Midwife}looks after you and, once your baby is born, she will visit each day until it is 10 days old. At our school, which is called Flanderwell Junior and Infant School, there is a{School Nurse}called Miss Robinson. She comes in regularly to inspect our hair.She gives us hearing and eye tests. Sometimes she sends you to the Doctor.The{School Dentist}comes in once a year to do dental screening. Some people see the Speech Therapist.
